channel.title: Which one is better [PI] or [Delta]?
channel.description: Now I been wondering this cause I see so many servers and tutorials for [PI] and also seems that [PI] has better graphics then [Delta], yet I love [Delta] because it is user friendly for me and i just get lost in [PI]'s folders,....but I'm wondering should i switch my server to a [PI]?

item.title: Which one is better [PI] or [Delta]?
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:11, topic:453872”][quote author=bhl simple link=topic=556738.msg4076191#msg4076191 date=1344869106]

PI has decent starter content that works well. Delta is outdated and it’s content is low quality.
[/quote]the quality isn’t low in Delta, just a factor it was never really built on to.

The quality for delta is low and that’s the reason its outdated,people try to work on ti still and they just make it look like trash.

Did you just called my projects trash[/quote]

It’s about to get reeeal

I wouldn’t chose either one tbh, they are both messy and look like they’ve gone through shitty developers. Unless that’s how the code was mean’t to look back in old java times.

Read full topic

item.title: Which one is better [PI] or [Delta]?
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

TheHolyGrail:

Delta is outdated

You’re making it seem as if it were an open source project. ‘Outdated’ isn’t a valid reason.

Read full topic

item.title: Which one is better [PI] or [Delta]?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“bhl simple, post:6, topic:453872”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=556738.msg4075716#msg4075716 date=1344805918]

PI has decent starter content that works well. Delta is outdated and it’s content is low quality.
[/quote]the quality isn’t low in Delta, just a factor it was never really built on to.

The quality for delta is low and that’s the reason its outdated,people try to work on ti still and they just make it look like trash.[/quote]not so, anything can be rewritten to perform better and be more efficient.

I know several people, myself included, who have done major stuff to delta and have improved it far better than any crappy PI

Read full topic

they’re both shit. i would choose pi though if i really HAVE to choose between those two

item.title: Which one is better [PI] or [Delta]?
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

If you really want to learn, I suggest Hyperion (assuming you know the basics of Java, but nothing more).
PI if your into loading high cache revisions and poorly written content (which can be fixed by you).
Delta if your into adding a lot yourself, and the blank base has no organization.

Read full topic

item.description:

PI has decent starter content that works well. Delta is outdated and it’s content is low quality.

item.title: Which one is better [PI] or [Delta]?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Both bases are quite good. It really depends if your looking for “easy tutorials that are most of the time poorly written” or if your looking for “an oldskool type of base that you can build from”

Read full topic
